author: Stephen Alpher
title: Bitcoin Busts Past $106K on Reported Iran/Israel Ceasefire
description: President Trump claimed a "complete and total" ceasefire between Iran and Israel to begin in several hours.
content:
A wild 72-hours of price swings continued in crypto late in the U.S. day on Monday after President Trump took to Truth Social to proclaim a "complete and total" ceasefire between Iran and Israel.
